original_text:
it is better for him to say to you, “Come up here,”
    than for him to humiliate you before his nobles.
What you have seen with your eyes
korean_text: 이는 사람이 네게 이리로 올라오라고 말하는 것이 네 눈에 보이는 귀인 앞에서 저리로 내려가라고 말하는 것보다 나음이니라

sentences.original_text: it is better for him to say to you
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 당신에게 말하는 것이 더 낫습니다

sentences.original_text: than for him to humiliate you
What you have seen with your eyes
